word:
Growing and Preserving Vegetables 

                                          Letter 5, 1904 
     519. Many do not see the importance of having land to cultivate, and of raising fruit and vegetables, that their tables may be supplied with these things. I am instructed to say to every family and every church, God will bless you when you work out your own salvation with fear and trembling, fearing lest, by unwise treatment of the body, you will mar the Lord's plan for you. 
     [ALL SHOULD BE ACQUAINTED WITH VALUE OF FRUITS AND VEGETABLES FRESH FROM THE ORCHARD AND GARDEN - 480]
